page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW RUISLIP
page.content: Hillingdon Borough is in the western part of Greater London.Ruislip is found in the north west of Hillingdon It is a very popular place to live because of the good communications with Greater London.Most of the houses were built in the 1930's but now new estates are going up.Prices are very high. Most people work in service industries there are few factories in Ruislip. There are several shopping centres :- Ruislip, West Ruislip, Ruislip Manor, Ruislip Gardens and Eastcote.The Ruislip area has a lot of greenery.There are 2 farms,a golf course ,a wood,a small Leisure complex and several playing fields. The Lido at the northern edge attracts many visitors to our area,for the water sport. We think Ruislip is a pleasant place to live, being near urban amenties but green.
